Issues.Title: Remove dead check from ToolStripControlHost. OnBoundsUpdated
Issues.Body:
## Proposed Changes
- This if statement can never be true as `Control` always implements `IArrangedElement`, and we checked for its non-nullness before. Collapse the `is` check into the `!= null` check

Issues.Title: Can test WinForms under Visual Studio
Issues.Body:
* .NET Core Version: (Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App 5.0.0-alpha.1.19625.3)
* Have you experienced this same bug with .NET Framework?: Yes/No
N/A
**Problem description:**
Following instructions on testing https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/blob/master/Documentation/testing-in-vs.md
very bottom Solution 2 does not work and you get the error below
**Actual behavior:**
```
The specified framework can be found at:
  - https://aka.ms/dotnet-core-applaunch?framework=Microsoft.NETCore.App&framework_version=5.0.0-alpha1.19514.1&arch=x64&rid=win10-x64
. Please check the diagnostic logs for more information.
```
**Expected behavior:**
Expect tests to run or there is a place to download the required framework.
**Minimal repro:**
Clone Winform Repo
Run .\build-local.ps1
Open VB 2019 16.5.0 Preview 1
Run any test and in the Output/Test Window you will see error above and test does not run
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Can test WinForms under Visual Studio" (#2580)
